sentences.en: An investor's top - down views are considered only insofar as they affect the valuation of securities.
sentences.cn: 一名投资人 自上而下 的观点只有在它们影响证券估值的情况下才会被考虑.

sentences.en: Dieting is good insofar as it prevents gluttony.
sentences.cn: 节食的好处就在于它能遏制人们的暴饮暴食.

sentences.en: Humanist insofar as it places the living human body at the centre.
sentences.cn: 这种人本主义,乃是就其把活着的人类的身体置于中心地位而言.

sentences.en: I shall do what I can insofar as I am able.
sentences.cn: 在力所能及的情况下我将尽力而为.

sentences.en: I'll help you insofar as I can.
Insofar as I can say now, I shall come.
sentences.cn: 目前我只能说我将会来.

sentences.en: Insofar as it can be ascertained, the horse lung is comparable to that of man.
sentences.cn: 就目前的研究程度而言, 马的肺可以和人类的肺相提并论.

sentences.en: Insofar as possible, our examples will be drawn from Chinese.
sentences.cn: 在可能范围内, 例证均引自汉语.

sentences.en: Insofar as they took some action to invite the advertisement, they may even find it useful.
sentences.cn: 在他们采取行动欢迎广告的范围内, 他们甚至会发现它的用处.

sentences.en: Insofar as you are a student of our college, you have access to our library facilities.
sentences.cn: 只要你是我们学院的学生就可以使用我们图书馆的设施.

sentences.en: Looking back helps insofar as it helps you learn from your mistakes.
sentences.cn: 审视过去的作用是能帮你从错误中吸取教训。

sentences.en: The solution is exact insofar as the model of the sphere is exact.
sentences.cn: 只要球的模型是精确的,这种解释就是精确的.

sentences.en: This principle is important in magnetic prospecting only insofar as it forms the basis.
sentences.cn: 这种原理就其构成基础而言,在磁法勘探中也是重要的.

sentences.en: Thus with such a tax, emissions will be curbed insofar nuisance they create exceeds their benefits.
sentences.cn: 这样,只要采取了这样一种税收措施, 排放者为了保证其收益,就会减少二氧化碳排放量,其所带来的危害也会随之减少.

sentences.en: You will learn you lessons only insofar as you are willing to keep studying them.
sentences.cn: 你的功课能学多少,完全视你肯努力的情形而定.

trans.tran_cn: 在这个范围，到这种程度
